'''<samp>armor_trims.png-atlas</samp>''' is a procedurally-generated [[texture atlas]] used to store textures for [[armor trim]]s.

== Format ==
<samp>armor_trims.png-atlas</samp> is a generated 2048Ã—1024-pixel file that stores textures for armor trim elements.

== History ==
{{HistoryTable
|{{HistoryLine|java}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.19.4|dev=23w04a|Added <samp>armor_trims.png-atlas</samp>.}}
|{{HistoryLine|||dev=Pre-release 3|The way in which sprites are arranged on atlases has been changed considerably, resulting in atlas dimensions being generally smaller.
|This atlas can now be exported to the screenshots folder using F3+S.}}
|{{HistoryLine||1.21.9|dev=25w31a|Mipmapped versions of this atlas are no longer generated.}}
}}

==== Mipmapped versions ====
{{Removed feature|edition=java|section=1}}
Minecraft also originally generated mipmapped versions of this atlas, for unknown reasons. They were not used by the game at all - only blocks placed in the world which use the json model system use mipmapped textures.<ref>{{bug|MC-276568|||Fixed}}</ref>
